meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>way</kanji> <kanji>method</kanji> or the <kanji>method</kanji> <kanji>way</kanji> is the <vocabulary>method</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>way</vocabulary>. This is a good word for talking about how to do something. What's the 方法? Well, first you...
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
